column5: Just a heads up that this Dollarama store has Storm Wild Eye bucktails 3/8 oz for $1/pack and packa of Storm rattle worms as well.  At the back of the store on an end aisle spot
Fang that rules.  I'll see if I can pop and and have a look.  Thanks.

The Kingston store has blue fox spinners, and shaky minnows.  They also have some other cheaper looking spinners, I can't remember the name of the company, might be whoever bought out shakespear because one of the spinners its self said that.  Also have a bunch of rapala hooks, both singles and trebles.
a store in scarborough had them also (storm plastics and jigs)
there is a dollarama on upper james. if i remember i'll check it out tonight. i heard they sell outboards there too.
